com.stabilit.sc.net
Class SCMPStreamHttpUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.sc.net.SCMPStreamHttpUtil

public class SCMPStreamHttpUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The Class SCMPStreamHttpUtil. Defines SCMP encoding/decoding of object into/from stream. Only used in case of nio client/server. In case of Netty the Netty framework takes over Http encoding/decoding stuff.
